summary: Full stack developer with experience in Java Spring Boot, React.js, Flask API, PostgreSQL, Redis, SDLC, debugging, CI/CD, reactive programming, logging and monitoring; currently working in healthcare domain.

highlights: Working in healthcare domain as a full stack developer
Tech: Java, Spring Boot, React.js, Flask API, PostgreSQL
Practices: SDLC, debugging, deployment, CI/CD, reactive programming, logging and monitoring

projects.name: Employee Talent Sphere
highlights: Built internal HR platform for managing employees, education, certifications, roadmaps, trainings, experience and skills
Designed dynamic forms, quizzes, and collaboration modules for supervisors and employees
Implemented role-based access, impersonation, and secure API integrations
Developed dashboards for visualizing skills, projects, and utilization
Built resume generator leveraging employee data for automated CV creation

projects.name: Health Service Provider App
highlights: Developed healthcare system for patients, doctors, and labs
Implemented appointments, reports, and feedback modules with secure REST APIs
Used Redis caching and Spring Cloud components for performance and scalability
Integrated notifications and reminders; improved UI responsiveness
Improved test coverage (JUnit, Mockito) and monitoring for production stability

projects.name: Gx Launchpad Web Application
highlights: Built web app with authentication and quizzes

projects.name: Food Delivery CLI
highlights: Built CLI application using OOP and multithreading concepts
Trained in Core Java, OS, DSA, and DBMS; practiced SQL and design concepts
Built Android apps (Unit Converter, To-Do List) using Java & SQLite

projects.name: Women’s Safety Android Application – SafeStree
highlights: Developed SOS alerts (Call/SMS/Location) and motion-triggered notifications
Integrated Firebase and Google Maps API
